game_details: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds is an online multiplayer battle royale game where players fight to be the last one standing.
Pro Evolution Soccer is a popular football (soccer) video game series known for its realistic gameplay and graphics.
Cricket is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams. It's known for its various formats, including Test, One Day, and T20.
Clash of Clans is a strategy-based mobile game where you build and upgrade your village, train troops, and attack other players.
Football, also known as soccer, is a team sport played with a spherical ball. It's the most popular sport globally.
Chess is a two-player strategy board game played on a chessboard. It requires skill, tactics, and strategic thinking.
Tennis is a racket sport played individually or in doubles. It's known for its fast-paced action and precise shots.
Basketball is a team sport played with a round ball and hoop. It's famous for its high-scoring games and slam dunks.
Minecraft is a sandbox game where players can build, explore, and survive in a blocky, open-world environment.
